basics.name: Mantri Aditya
basics.label: Supply Chain Engineer
basics.summary: I currently contribute to Supply Chain Engineering at GreyOrange.

work.summary: Actively involved in transport planning and scheduling operations using Automation.
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee Robot performance for inventory management
Drive, design and build inventory schedules and testing reports.
Involved in data retrival using SQL query language
Prepared interactive dashboards and reports in Qlikview, MS Excel and Power BI for Scrum meetings

volunteer.summary: Lead the development of Machine Learning algorithm for predicting potential fund sponsors
highlights: Designed, trained and tested Machine Leaning models over 600 sponsors data gathered over 5 years.
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure in Google Colab

awards.title: First place
awards.awarder: University at Buffalo Blackstone Launchpad Competition
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2022 for generating preventive measures for future threats using historic earthquake data.
